definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
to confine/to lock up/to pen in
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle

sentences.english: Her eyes were framed by dark circles.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛周围是浓重的黑烟圈。

sentences.english: The air YanJuan all is me to your attachment.
sentences.chinese: 空气中的烟圈都是我对你的眷恋。

sentences.english: He lit one of the cigarettes, and blew a cloud of smoke.
sentences.chinese: 他点燃了一根香烟，然后吹了一个烟圈。

sentences.english: Then I learned a new song called SMOKE RINGS IN THE DARK.
sentences.chinese: 接着我又学习了一首名为《黑暗中的烟圈》的歌曲。
